== Who I am ==

My name is Kuba Pawlak and I joined the Ubuntu Kernel Team in late 2022. I received a master's degree in electronics and Telecommunication from Technical University of Łódź. Before joining Canonical, I was working on software for embedded systems, mostly around wireless interfaces. I also have a history of working in automotive projects.

== My Ubuntu story ==

My first contact with Linux was around 2005 . It was an Arch Linux that I quickly trashed. The next install was Ubuntu Hoary Hedgehog. Since then I was exclusively developing on Linux for Linux. I mostly used Ubuntus, with a short break for Fedoras after Unity release.

=== My involvement ===

I am mostly involved with the HWE enablement. I mainly contribute to the S32g and Capilano kernels. In addition I try to contribute to SRU cycle. Lately I was assigned repackaging NVIDIA drivers.

=== Plans for the future ===

Short term, I aim to receive upload rights in order to be able to work more autonomously and to not cause additional work for sponsors. In the future I want to get involved more into HWE enablement and platform bring-up.

=== Things I could do better ===

I struggle most with balancing different tasks that have priority at the same time. I want to be better at distributing focus time between tasks and thus to be able to finish them in an efficient, timely manner. Furthermore, proactively engaging in activities outside of my usual workload when time allows could broaden my knowledge in many areas.
